markdown.content: Honestly speaking try to stop caring or thinking how other people would react when they see your code. Be proud of your bad code. Prioritize function over looks (both graphical looks and how the code looks). Form should be from function, not the other way round. Just do it. Just start coding in the most naive, worst way possible. You cannot edit a blank page. It's literally impossible to write objectively the best code before you write any code.
